keyDifferentiators.title: Text Preservation
keyDifferentiators.ourAdvantage: Superior text and logo clarity, maintains crisp edges and readability
keyDifferentiators.theirLimitation: Text often becomes blurry or softened during upscaling

keyDifferentiators.title: Accessibility
keyDifferentiators.ourAdvantage: Web-based, works from any device, no installation required
keyDifferentiators.theirLimitation: Desktop software only, requires installation and local resources

keyDifferentiators.title: Processing Speed
keyDifferentiators.ourAdvantage: Fast cloud processing, 10x faster for most images
keyDifferentiators.theirLimitation: Limited by local computer hardware and resources

keyDifferentiators.title: Cost Structure
keyDifferentiators.ourAdvantage: Free tier available, affordable monthly subscription
keyDifferentiators.theirLimitation: Expensive $99.99 one-time purchase, no free trial

faq.question: Is MyImageUpscaler really better than Topaz Gigapixel?
faq.answer: For images containing text, logos, or graphics, yes! We specialize in text preservation while Gigapixel focuses on photos. For pure photography, both are excellent, but we offer web convenience and better pricing.

faq.question: Why is Topaz Gigapixel so expensive?
faq.answer: Gigapixel charges $99.99 for their desktop software with advanced features. We offer a more accessible web-based solution with competitive pricing and free credits to start.

faq.question: Can I try both before deciding?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer 10 free credits to test our service. Topaz offers a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try both risk-free.

faq.question: Which is better for batch processing?
faq.answer: Both offer batch processing. Our cloud-based processing can be faster for large batches, while Gigapixel is limited by your computer's processing power.

faq.question: Does MyImageUpscaler have face refinement like Gigapixel?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer excellent face enhancement and portrait improvement, though Gigapixel has more granular controls for professional photographers.

faq.question: Can I switch from Gigapixel to MyImageUpscaler?
faq.answer: Yes! Many users switch for our superior text handling and web convenience. Start with our free credits to see the difference in quality and ease of use.
